description: This is the public dashboard. Anyone — whether logged in or not — can view this page.
about_page.title: ℹ️ About Us
about_page.intro: Welcome to {{name}}! We are a passionate team dedicated to innovation, transparency, and collaboration.
about_page.mission_text: Our mission is to make technology accessible to everyone. Whether you're an individual, entrepreneur, or organization – we provide the right tools, knowledge, and support to help you achieve your goals.
about_page.whatwedo_list: Integration of modern technologies such as Laravel, Vue.js, and AI
about_page.team_text: Our team consists of experienced developers, designers, and strategists. We focus on both quality and user-friendliness.
about_page.location_text: We are based in the Netherlands but work with clients all across Europe.
about_page.contact: Want to collaborate or learn more? Feel free to contact us!
positions_intro: We believe in a fair, sustainable, and future-focused society. Below are the core values we stand for:
position_sustainability_text: We actively work towards a cleaner future. From energy saving to circular economy, sustainability is central to our strategy.
position_accessibility_text: Technology should be available and understandable for everyone. We design with accessibility, security, and transparency in mind.
position_local_text: We encourage collaboration with local businesses, institutions, and citizens. Together we build strong communities.
position_education_text: We invest in education and knowledge sharing. Innovation starts with the exchange of ideas — we organize workshops, trainings, and digital tools.
position_inclusion_text: Every person matters. We believe in equal opportunities and build systems that include everyone.
contact_page.title: 📬 Contact Us
contact_page.intro: Do you have questions about our security solutions or want to request a quote? Feel free to reach out to us.
contact_page.response_time: We aim to respond to email inquiries within 24 hours.
donate.title: Support our initiative!
donate.description: Choose an amount or enter your own. We are grateful for every contribution!
donate.footer: Secure payment via iDEAL, Bancontact, PayPal, and more.
donate.success.title: Thank you for your donation!
donate.success.message: Your payment was successfully processed. Your support means the world to us.
Name: Name
